basic.description: This course covers functions and graphs, especially high degree polynomial, rational, exponential, and logarithmic functions; systems of equations; solutions of linear systems; matrix methods; determinants; sequences and series; induction; and the binomial theorem. The course also explores applications, approximation, and methods of proof. May be taken concurrently with MAC 1114.
basic.subject: MAC
basic.title: Precalculus Algebra

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: MAC 1105 or suitable mathematics examination placement score.
